name: Free Kicks
description:
Free Kicks is a free kick simulation game!

FEATURES
Clock - Shot targets in the goal In limited time.

Match - Take a single shot on the goal while it is defended by the opposing team's goalkeeper. You will play both for the striker player and for a goalkeeper.

Bluetooth - You can connect with your friend's phone to play against each other.

Train - Improve your shooting or goalkeeper's skill. You can switch from the striker player to goalkeeper, and vice versa.
